concept.title: AF PGI 5301.170-3 Post-award Peer Reviews of Service Contracts

conbody.p: The contracting officer notifies the cognizant SAF/AQC action officer of all Peer Reviews to be accomplished in accordance with DFARS PGI 201.170-3 at least 10 business days prior to the required review.
